books.author: by Bob Woodward and Robert Costa
books.description: The Washington Post journalists detail the dangers and challenges during the transition to the Biden presidency.
books.name: PERIL

books.author: by Anderson Cooper and Katherine Howe
books.description: The CNN host and descendant of the Vanderbilt family charts the rise and fall of this American dynasty.
books.name: VANDERBILT

books.author: by Mark R. Levin
books.description: The Fox News host gives his take on the Green New Deal, critical race theory and social activism.
books.name: AMERICAN MARXISM

books.author: by Cassandra Peterson
books.description: The actress details the moments from her life and career that shaped the creation of her character Elvira, Mistress of the Dark.
books.name: YOURS CRUELLY, ELVIRA

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Scott Gottlieb
books.description: The former F.D.A. commissioner assesses America’s Covid-19 response and prescribes ways to prepare for other pandemics.
books.name: UNCONTROLLED SPREAD

books.author: by Gabrielle Union with Kevin Carr O’Leary
books.description: The actress shares some of the challenges and changes she has faced in recent years.
books.name: YOU GOT ANYTHING STRONGER?

books.author: by Chris Wallace with Mitch Weiss
books.description: The intelligence gathering, security strategizing and military planning during the final eight months of the pursuit of Osama bin Laden.
books.name: COUNTDOWN BIN LADEN

books.author: by Mary Roach
books.description: An exploration of disciplinary actions and preventative measures occuring at the intersection of human behavior and wildlife biology.
books.name: FUZZ

books.author: by Robin Wall Kimmerer
books.description: A botanist and member of the Citizen Potawatomi Nation espouses having an understanding and appreciation of plants and animals.
books.name: BRAIDING SWEETGRASS

books.author: by Rick Bragg
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning author recounts the impact an ill-behaved stray dog had on him during an uncertain time.
books.name: THE SPECKLED BEAUTY

books.author: by Lucy Adlington
books.description: Twenty-five young inmates of the Auschwitz-Birkenau concentration camp made garments for elite Nazi women.
books.name: THE DRESSMAKERS OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Roxane van Iperen
books.description: Janny and Lien Brilleslijper from Amsterdam were sent by train to Auschwitz when the Jewish safehouse they created in the woods was discovered.
books.name: THE SISTERS OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Glennon Doyle
books.description: The activist and public speaker describes her journey of listening to her inner voice.
books.name: UNTAMED

books.author: by Evan Osnos
books.description: The National Book Award and Pulitzer Prize winner examines the shifts in American culture and politics by visiting three cities in which he has lived.
books.name: WILDLAND
